title: And Just Like That.....Episode 3 Review - "When in Rome"
itunes:title: And Just Like That.....Episode 3 Review - "When in Rome"
description:
This week Madi and Aleena review episode 3 of And Just Like That. Is the "wokeness" being covered in the reboot welcomed or too much? Does Miranda's alcoholism make sense? is Miranda and Steve's parenting style with Brady common? And lastly, is this whole drama with Natasha warranted? If you're interested in the answers to these questions, check us out this week!


Don't forget to follow us, leave a review, and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
